title: The Terrible Underpants
description: What would you do if everyone in the whole wide world saw your most Terrible Underpant? That's the problem Wanda-Linda has to solve one windy day. Readers of any age will be powerless to resist this cautionary tale about sprinklers, Mrs. Kafoops, a hairy-nosed wombat, and some worn-out elastic.
author: Kaz Cooke
